_header: Alone walking / In thought plaining / And sore sighing
_description: The Lover’s Lament, a pseudo-Chaucerian virelai — five 8-line tail-rhyme stanzas

CamTCC599.First Lines:
Alone walkyngIn thought pleynyngAnd sore syghyngAll
                    desolate…
CamTCC599.Attributed Author:
Chaucer (added by later hand in left margin beside line 1, f.
                        160ra)
